title: New Central Bank Governor, & Finance Secretary appointed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe was appointed as the new Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka on Thursday (7).
The President’s Media Division announced that he received the letter of appointment from President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Thursday (7) evening.
At the same time, K. M. M. Siriwardena was appointed as the new Finance Secretary.
Shortages will be resolved soon, public should not underestimate trust placed in Govt
